restrict: ◎第一階段需人工加選◎第二階段需人工加選◎加退選階段需人工加選
description: 共同科英文（一）課程為一學年課程，每學期兩學分，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 增進學生英語溝通表達能力
透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神
透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野
透過課堂討論培養批判精神
提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣
syllabus:
**Course Description:**

This course is designed to introduce NTNU students to university-level English. It will train students to listen to English text materials and it will also guide students to read, discuss and respond to critical essays analyzing four popular literary genres including romance, horror, detective and fantasy. Students will have the chance to apply the language skills they have learned through eight listening transcriptions, one midterm and one final exam, one individual presentation, and near the end of this course, through a group presentation in the form of a micro film. Students are expected to attend regularly, to contribute with compassion and creativity, and to show commitment to course assignments and group activities. The course attempts to facilitate English learning beyond technicality—as means to think critically about how contemporary popular culture sheds light on the study of the humanities.
